#localmacro.custSalesRepRange '((CommissionSalesRep.GroupId == CustTable.salesGroup) && (CommissionSalesRep.Person == \%1)) || (CustTable.MainContactWorker == \%2)' #endmacro
//Sana Commerce API templates #localmacro.TestConnectionReq '<Request>
'+ ' <Operation>TestConnection</Operation>
'+ ' <Params>
'+ ' <WebsiteId>SanaStore</WebsiteId>
'+ ' </Params>
'+ '</Request>' #endmacro
#localmacro.GetCustomers '<Request>
'+ ' <Operation>GetCustomers</Operation>
'+ ' <Params>
'+ ' <PageIndex>0</PageIndex>
'+ ' <PageSize>10</PageSize>
'+ ' <SortField></SortField>
'+ ' <SortAscending>1</SortAscending>
'+ ' <ValidOnly>1</ValidOnly>
'+ ' <LoadShippingAddresses>0</LoadShippingAddresses>
'+ ' <SalesPersonId></SalesPersonId>
'+ ' <LanguageId>1031</LanguageId>
'+ ' <Filter>
'+ ' <for field="Id">
'+ ' <Equal>1101</Equal>
'+ ' <Between>
'+ ' <min>0</min>
'+ ' <max>9999999</max>
'+ ' </Between>
'+ ' <NotEqual>1102</NotEqual>
'+ ' </for>
'+ ' </Filter>
'+ ' <ExtraFields>
'+ ' <field name="Balance"/>
'+ ' <field name="CustGroup;Name"/>
'+ ' </ExtraFields>
'+ ' <WebsiteId>SanaStore</WebsiteId>
'+ ' </Params>
'+ '</Request>' #endmacro
#localmacro.CalculateBasket '<Request>
'+ ' <Operation>CalculateBasket</Operation>
'+ ' <Params>
'+ ' <Basket>
'+ ' <SalesLines>
'+ ' <SalesLine>
'+ ' <field name="Id" value="4225663f-b835-4b76-99b1-7316e5bf36e7" />
'+ ' <field name="Quantity" value="1" />
'+ ' <field name="ProductId" value="0001" />
'+ ' <field name="VariantId" />
'+ ' <field name="PrepackId" />
'+ ' <field name="LineType" value="item" />
'+ ' <field name="UnitOfMeasureId" value="ea" />
'+ ' <field name="QuantityPrecision" value="1" />
'+ ' <field name="SalesAgreementLineNo" value="" />
'+ ' <field name="SkipSalesAgreement" value="1" />
'+ ' </SalesLine>
'+ ' <SalesLine>
'+ ' <field name="Id" value="ac927e44-cd77-496d-a103-cb2b0cfef175" />
'+ ' <field name="Quantity" value="1" />
'+ ' <field name="ProductId" />
'+ ' <field name="VariantId" />
'+ ' <field name="LineType" value="shippingcosts" />
'+ ' <field name="Title" value="Free shipping" />
'+ ' <field name="Price" value="0.0000" />
'+ ' </SalesLine>
'+ ' <SalesLine>
'+ ' <field name="Id" value="ac1aa74b-b799-4199-a31c-2257d7ec18cd" />
'+ ' <field name="Quantity" value="1" />
'+ ' <field name="ProductId" value="NA3BKPV6" />
'+ ' <field name="VariantId" />
'+ ' <field name="PrepackId" />
'+ ' <field name="LineType" value="promotioncode" />
'+ ' <field name="Title" value="WT Valid promocode" />
'+ ' <field name="DiscountType" value="Percentage" />
'+ ' <field name="DiscountValue" value="0.1" />
'+ ' </SalesLine>
'+ ' </SalesLines>
'+ ' <field name="Id" value="8ee74fa2-b11e-4da8-a69f-e8572b7c78dd" />
'+ ' <field name="LastUpdate" value="7/22/2013 5:38:43 PM" />
'+ ' </Basket>
'+ ' <AccountId>1001</AccountId>
'+ ' <AccountType>Customer</AccountType>
'+ ' <ContactId />
'+ ' <CurrencyId>USD</CurrencyId>
'+ ' <CheckStock>0</CheckStock>
'+ ' <B2bOnlinePayments>Prepayment</B2bOnlinePayments>
'+ ' <ShopAccountType>Customer</ShopAccountType>
'+ ' <LanguageId>1033</LanguageId>
'+ ' <ShippingMethodCode></ShippingMethodCode>
'+ ' <PaymentMethodCode></PaymentMethodCode>
'+ ' <SalesAgreementId></SalesAgreementId>
'+ ' <ShippingAddress>
'+ ' <field name="Id" value=""/>
'+ ' <field name="Name" value="Customer name"/>
'+ ' <field name="Address" value="Shipping address"/>
'+ ' <field name="Address2" value="Shippnig address 2"/>
'+ ' <field name="ZipCode" value="3044"/>
'+ ' <field name="City" value="Rotterdam"/>
'+ ' <field name="CountryId" value="NL"/>
'+ ' <field name="State" />
'+ ' </ShippingAddress>
'+ ' <WebsiteId>SanaStore</WebsiteId>
'+ ' </Params>
'+ '</Request>' #endmacro

#localmacro.GetEntities '<Request>
'+ ' <Operation>GetEntities</Operation>
'+ ' <Params>
'+ ' <Table>InventTable</Table>
'+ ' <PageIndex>0</PageIndex>
'+ ' <PageSize>10</PageSize>
'+ ' <SortField></SortField>
'+ ' <SortAscending>1</SortAscending>
'+ ' <Filter>
'+ ' <for field="ItemId">
'+ ' <Greater>0</Greater>
'+ ' <LessOrEqual>10000</LessOrEqual>
'+ ' <Equal>0001</Equal>
'+ ' <Between>
'+ ' <min>0001</min>
'+ ' <max>0002</max>
'+ ' </Between>
'+ ' </for>
'+ ' <for field="Name">
'+ ' <Contains>John</Contains>
'+ ' <NotContains>Doe</NotContains>
'+ ' <NotEqual>John Doe</NotEqual>
'+ ' </for>
'+ ' </Filter>
'+ ' <ExtraFields>
'+ ' <field name="No."/>
'+ ' <field name="Name"/>
'+ ' </ExtraFields>
'+ ' <WebsiteId>SanaStore</WebsiteId>
'+ ' </Params>
'+ '</Request>' #endmacro
